text: IMT | Senior DevOps Engineer | Rennes, France | ONSITE | FULLTIME Institut Mines-Télécom (IMT - https://www.imt.fr/en/) is a public institution dedicated to higher education, research (~1500 researchers) and innovation in engineering and digital technologies. We look for a senior DevOps engineer (5+ years experience) to join our team who develops and operates the TeraLab platfom https://www.teralab-datascience.fr/ . For about 5 years, TeraLab has hosted more than 60 innovation, research and education projects in the data domain (big data, AI, blockchain …). Most often with open source technologies, we address cloud, distributed and secured architectures, cloud provisioning and configuration automation, datascience environment setup (linux, shorewall, nginx, openVpn QEMU/KVM,Docker, Kubernetes, Hadoop/spark, Cassandra, Mongodb, influxdb, ElasticSearch, Pyton/scikitlearn, R, tensor flow, Grafana, Ansible, Zabbix, gitlab….). We restitute experience from/to our projects contacts (from large companies, SME, startups, researchers, students) and providers/partners Given our small team size (currently 4 persons excluding physical infrastructure), you as the engineers in place are expected to address all the platform components and activities. Profile: - Senior devops engineer - has experienced most of the above technologies and is skilled in network and security domains - autonomous, responsible, thorough
